items.summary: Fix and complete the deployment documentation in frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md so a developer can follow it end-to-end to publish the latest Tripple Host build to Internet Computer mainnet (IC) without missing sections or broken Markdown formatting.

Harden the IC mainnet deployment scripts (frontend/scripts/deploy-ic.sh and frontend/scripts/verify-deploy.sh) so they are reliable to run and produce clear English output that guides the user to the live site URL.

Ensure the live (mainnet) deployment verification checklist in documentation and/or scripts includes the critical functional smoke tests for this app (landing page loads, Internet Identity login works, admin setup claim works only when no admins exist, and admin panel opens for admins).
